opportunity_teaser: This grant opportunity is designed to support high-achieving students of Iranian descent who are pursuing their educational dreams. With funding amounts starting at $1,000 and potentially exceeding this amount, the program aims to empower individuals by providing financial assistance for their academic pursuits. The scholarships are available to graduating high school students and full-time college students, with a focus on those demonstrating academic excellence and a commitment to their education. The opportunity is open to applicants worldwide, with particular emphasis on students from Iran and the USA. Eligible applicants include nonprofit organizations and individuals who meet the criteria of being of Iranian or Persian descent. The foundation believes in the transformative power of education and aims to facilitate the aspirations of the new generation of young Iranians. By offering these scholarships, the program not only alleviates financial burdens but also encourages students to strive for excellence in their academic endeavors. The application process is straightforward, with an annual deadline of June 30th for submissions. Students are encouraged to apply each year, allowing them to continue receiving support throughout their educational journey. This initiative is a significant step towards fostering a community of empowered individuals who can contribute positively to society. The foundation's commitment to education reflects a broader mission of promoting success and empowerment through learning. By investing in the future of these students, the program aims to create a lasting impact that extends beyond individual achievements. The scholarships are not just financial aid; they represent a belief in the potential of young Iranians to excel and make meaningful contributions to their communities and the world. This grant opportunity is an invitation for eligible students to take a proactive step towards achieving their educational goals and realizing their dreams. With the support of this program, students can focus on their studies and personal growth, knowing that financial assistance is available to help them succeed. The foundation encourages all eligible applicants to seize this opportunity and apply for the scholarships that can help turn their aspirations into reality.
